articles.content:
Floral baskets laid before Kim Il Sung's statue 
    Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets were laid before President Kim Il Sung's statue on Mansu Hill in Pyongyang by officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations of foreign embassies here, delegations and delegates of foreign organizations for the study of the Juche idea on Monday on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of the president.
 They placed floral baskets before the statue with profound veneration for him before paying homage to him.

articles.content:
Awarding ceremony of honour prizes
    Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The Kim Il Sung Youth Honour Prize and the Kim Il Sung Children Honour Prize were awarded to exemplary organizations of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, young service persons and school youth and children on the occasion of the day of the sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
 A decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly was read out at an awarding ceremony at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on April 13 and 40 youth league organizations and 156 youth league officials and members were awarded the Kim Il Sung Youth Honour Prize.    
 The Kim Il Sung Children Honour Prize was conferred on 194 schoolchildren.

Educational aid fund and stipends to children of Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Educational aid fund and stipends to children of Koreans in Japan
    Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) - General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent 239.6 million yen of educational aid fund and stipends for the development of the democratic national education of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
 A total of educational aid fund and stipends up to the 149th installment sent by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for the children of Koreans in Japan amounts to 45,106,163,000 yen in Japanese currency.    
 The deep loving care shown for the children of Koreans under Chongryon on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung, will encourage the Koreans in Japan in devoting themselves to the prosperity of the socialist homeland, national reunification and the strengthening of the movement of Koreans in Japan and contribute to the development of Chongryon democratic national education.

Plan for cultural exchange between DPRK and Indonesia signed
articles.content:
Plan for cultural exchange between DPRK and Indonesia signed
    Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A 2003-2005 plan for cultural exchange between the governments of the DPRK and Indonesia was signed here today.
 It was inked by Jon Yong Jin, vice-chairman of the Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and Sri Hastanto, vice-Minister of Culture and Tourism of Indonesia, who is heading a government cultural delegation.
